book.title: No Filter: The Inside Story of Instagram
book.author: Sarah Frier

attributes.point: Discusses the rapid growth of Instagram.
Financial literacy means a broad understanding of accounting and investing and knowing the markets and the law.
Each chapter ends with a “Study Session,” which reviews the material and poses questions.
Tips on developing a cordial relationship with the other side.
Avoiding the trap of being “nice” and getting walked all over.
